name: Golf Defense
description:
Golf Defense is a game where you have to defend you base by playing golf. Enemies will shoot at you with with an excessive amount of golf balls. If you miss to many, you loose.

A simple upgrade system helps you improve your chances against these relentless golfers!

Created in 48 hours, now I can finally get some much needed sleep.

Note: Sadly I got a last minute bug where you loose  about 10-20 lives instead of 1. So consider this the Hardcore version of my game.
